name: Idlenetics
description:
The main goal is to send a ship with resources at the other island. You will unlock new zones, strategize and manage their resources effectively to send the ship and complete their journey.

Each zone features unique buildings that can be purchased. During gameplay you will craft more complex items by combining the objects produced by the buildings.

The game offers a unique blend of idle and crafting elements, making it an exciting and challenging experience. With its beautifully 3D graphics and immersive medieval setting, Idlenetics is sure to be a hit with fans of idle and crafting games alike!
